channel.title: Getting Started on Wails
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on Wails

item.title: Linux
item.description: There are many Linux distributions in existence and we strive to support as many as possible. Oficially supported distros: Distro Version Debian 8, 9, 10 Ubuntu 16.04, 18,04, 19.04 Arch Rolling CentOS 6, 7 Fedora 29, 30 Community supported distros: Distro Version Zorin 15 Parrot 4.

item.title: Mac
item.description: Now you are ready to move on to the next step of installing Wails.

item.title: Windows
item.description: Now you are ready to move on to the next step of installing Wails.

item.title: Installing Wails
item.description: Installation is as simple as running the following command: go get github.com/wailsapp/wails/cmd/wails Once installed, the wails update command may be used for subsequent updates. To get the latest pre-release with bleeding-edge features the -pre flag can be appended wails update -pre. Setup To finish the installation setup your Wails system by running the setup command wails setup and filling your handle and email. Generate a new project Generate a new project using the init command wails init.
